Load the PEP into the BiocProject

loadPEP.Rd

This function loads the PEP into the metadata slot of the BiocProject object using the Project constructor of the pepr package

loadPEP(.Object, file, subproject)

Arguments

.Object

object of class BiocProject
file

a character vecotr with a path to the config file
subproject

a character vector with a name of the subproject to be activated

Value

object of class BiocProject with the metadata slot populated with the Project object

Details

This funciton is used in the BiocProject initialize method and should not be used outside

See also

https://pepkit.github.io/

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • Details
